mapper.select: select e.emp_no, e.name, e.email, e.join_date, d.dept_name, j.job_title, j.job_level,e.intl_no from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} order by e.join_date desc

select e.emp_no, e.name, e.email, e.join_date, d.dept_name, j.job_title, e.intl_no from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no}
order by e.emp_no
order by e.join_date desc
order by e.name

select e.emp_no, e.name, e.email, e.join_date, j.job_title, e.intl_no, e.phone from tb_employee e join tb_department d using (dept_no) join tb_company c using (cp_no) join tb_job_title j using (job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} and d.dept_name = #{dept_name}

select e.name, d.dept_name, e.email, e.phone, j.job_title, e.intl_no, e.resign_yn, e.emp_no from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} and e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
select d.dept_name from tb_department d join tb_company c using(cp_no) where cp_no = #{cp_no} order by d.dept_no
select d.dept_name from tb_department d join tb_company c using(cp_no) where cp_no = #{cp_no} and (select count(emp_no) from tb_employee te where te.dept_no = d.dept_no) != 0 order by d.dept_no

select d.dept_name, d.dept_no, d.dept_date, d.active_yn, d.emp_no, (select name from tb_employee e where e.emp_no = d.emp_no) admin_name , d.dept_upper_no, (select dept_name from tb_department where d.dept_upper_no = dept_no) dept_upper_name from tb_department d join tb_department d2 on d.dept_no = d2.dept_no where d.cp_no = 1 group by d.dept_name, d.dept_no, d.dept_date, d.active_yn, d.emp_no, d.dept_upper_no order by d.dept_no

select d.dept_no, d.dept_name ,d.cp_no, d.dept_date, d.active_yn, d.emp_no , (select name from tb_employee where emp_no = d.emp_no) admin_name , (select dept_name from tb_department where d.dept_upper_no = dept_no) dept_upper_name from tb_department d where cp_no = #{cp_no} and dept_no = #{dept_no}
select j.job_title from tb_job_title j join tb_company c using(cp_no) where cp_no = #{cp_no} order by job_level desc
mapper.update: update (select e.intl_no, e.resign_yn from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} and e.emp_no = #{emp_no}) set intl_no = #{intl_no}, resign_yn = #{resign_yn}
update tb_employee set dept_no = (select dept_no from tb_department where dept_name = #{dept_name} and cp_no = #{cp_no}) where emp_no = #{emp_no}
update tb_employee set job_title_no = (select job_title_no from tb_job_title where job_title = #{job_title} and cp_no = #{cp_no}) where emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.select: select e.emp_no, e.name, e.email, e.join_date, d.dept_name, j.job_title, e.intl_no, e.resign_yn from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} and e.hr_yn = 'Y'
mapper.update: update tb_employee set hr_yn = 'N' where hr_yn = 'Y' and emp_no in (select te.emp_no from tb_employee te join tb_department td on te.dept_no = td.dept_no where td.cp_no = #{cp_no})
update tb_employee set hr_yn = 'Y' where emp_no in (select te.emp_no from tb_employee te join tb_department td on te.dept_no = td.dept_no where td.cp_no = #{cp_no} and td.dept_name = #{dept_name})
mapper.select: select nt_no, nt_title, nt_content, nt_date from tb_notice where cp_no = #{cp_no} order by nt_date
select rownum, a.* from (select nt_no, nt_title, nt_content, nt_date from tb_notice where cp_no = #{cp_no} order by nt_date) a order by rownum desc
mapper.update: update tb_notice set nt_title = #{nt_title}, nt_content = #{nt_content} where nt_no = #{nt_no} and cp_no = #{cp_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_notice where nt_no = #{nt_no} and cp_no = #{cp_no}
mapper.select: select * from tb_attendance a join tb_employee e using (emp_no) where to_char(a.ATT_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{att_date_start} and #{att_date_end} order by att_date desc
select dept_name, dept_no from tb_department where cp_no = #{cp_no}
select d.dept_name, e.name , e.emp_no, e.RESIGN_YN from tb_employee e join tb_department d on e.dept_no=d.dept_no where cp_no = #{cp_no}
